Haeren was a location in the western par: The location is not mentioned in The Lord of the Rings
and its nature is unknown. The name of the location only appears as a handwritten addition by J.R.R. Tolkien on the final version of the General Map of Middle-earth.

Haeren was a location in the western par: The meaning of the name is unknown
but the beginning hae- may contain the Sindarin adjective hae "very far away" (compare Haerast "Far Shore").
